data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Nagios is a network monitoring system.

    http://nagios.org

    My module provides an OO interface to the variouis objects that are
    configured in the Nagios system. I have seen many requests for such
    a module on the Nagios mailing list and such a module can be very
    useful in integrating other applications and/or extending Nagios.
